hero.title: Taste Moldova in Every Delivery

story.title: Why Moldova Direct?
story.subtitle: We are on a mission to make Moldovaâ€™s heritage ingredients and winemaking accessible to curious palates everywhere.

heritage.title: Heritage you can taste
heritage.description: Every collection highlights native grapes, protected origins, and regional recipes.

craft.title: Craft-first sourcing
craft.description: We work with small cooperatives and family estates that prioritise sustainable farming.

pairings.title: Pairings & expertise
pairings.description: Sommelier notes and chef-inspired pairings accompany each delivery.

timeline.title: From Moldova to Spain
timeline.description: A few milestones that shaped our community.

items.title: First harvest partnerships
items.description: Launched with three pioneering wineries from the Codru region.

items.title: Nationwide delivery
items.description: Expanded cold-chain logistics to serve every province in Spain.

items.title: Culinary collaborations
items.description: Partnered with chefs and sommeliers to design seasonal tasting boxes.

services.title: Services tailored to every occasion
services.subtitle: From intimate dinners to large corporate events, our team is ready to curate the perfect Moldovan experience.

gifting.title: Personal & celebratory gifting
gifting.description: Customise handwritten notes, delivery schedules, and presentation for memorable surprises.

corporate.title: Corporate & hospitality solutions
corporate.description: Design tasting menus, bulk hampers, and private-label selections with dedicated account support.

newsletter.title: Stay on top of new drops
newsletter.subtitle: Be the first to hear about seasonal releases, pairing guides, and invitations to private tastings.
newsletter.success: Thank you! Look for our next dispatch in your inbox.
newsletter.disclaimer: We send one or two emails per month and you can unsubscribe at any time.

faqPreview.title: Questions before you order?
faqPreview.subtitle: Weâ€™ve answered the essentials to make your first delivery effortless.

shipping.question: How fast is shipping in Spain?
shipping.answer: Orders ship twice per week from our Madrid hub with delivery in 48â€“72 hours for most locations.

packaging.question: Will my order arrive chilled?
packaging.answer: Yes. Temperature-controlled packaging keeps wines and perishables at optimal conditions throughout transit.

support.question: Can I speak with someone for recommendations?
support.answer: Our concierge team is available via WhatsApp and email to suggest pairings and build custom boxes.

delivery.question: How fast do you deliver?
delivery.answer: Orders placed before 16:00 ship the same day and arrive within 48 hours in mainland Spain.

storage.question: How should I store it?
storage.answer: Keep in a cool, dry space away from direct sunlight. Wines rest best between 12â€“18Â°C.

allergens.question: Does it contain allergens?
allergens.answer: Full allergen and ingredient details are listed on the label and product page. Contact us for specifics.

returns.question: What if something arrives damaged?
returns.answer: Let us know within 7 days and weâ€™ll organise a replacement or full refund immediately.
